text:
Glad to learn new infections in the #USA (worst hit in the world by the #COVID19, #CoronaVirus) has fallen by 44% OVER THE PAST 3 WKS IN 44 STATES!
And experts think it's not the #vaccine cos only 8% of #Americans have taken the first dose.
#MaskUp & GET THESE #Vaccines! COME ON! https://t.co/CAELc9fd0C
